macros.sourceContext:
|
  • The CSS Font Loading API has been completely implemented and is now enabled by default (Firefox bug 1149381).
    • |
  • Shared workers can no longer be shared between private (i.e. browsing in a private window) and non-private documents (see Firefox bug 1177621).
    • > |
  • The {{domxref("URLUtilsSearchParams.searchParams")}} property is now read-only (Firefox bug 1174731).
    • ^ |
  • The {{domxref('HTMLAnchorElement.hash')}} property no longer decodes URL fragment (Firefox bug 1093611).
    • |

title: Firefox 41 for developers
summary: To test the latest developer features of Firefox, install Firefox Developer Edition Firefox 41 was released on September 22, 2015. This article lists key changes that are useful not only for web developers, but also Firefox and Gecko developers as well as add-on developers.
